      • isIntentAvailable

        public static boolean isIntentAvailable(Context context,
                                        java.lang.String action,
                                        boolean debug)
        Indicates whether the specified action can be used as an intent. This method queries the package manager for installed packages that can respond to an intent with the specified action. If no suitable package is found, this method returns false.
        Parameters:
        context - The application's environment.
        action - Name of the Intent action to be checked for availability.
        debug - Enable/disable debug messages.
        Returns:
        True if an Intent with the specified action can be sent and responded to, false otherwise.

      • isIntentAvailable

        public static boolean isIntentAvailable(Context context,
                                        java.lang.String action)

      • rateApp

        public static Intent rateApp(Context context,
                             boolean debug)
        Creates a Google Play Store rating intent for the specified app context
        Parameters:
        context - The application's environment.
        debug - Enable/disable debug messages.
        Returns:
        the rating intent

      • rateApp

      • playAudio

        public static boolean playAudio(Context context,
                                int resourceID,
                                boolean debug)
        Plays an audio file
        Parameters:
        context - The application's environment.
        resourceID - The raw resource id (R.raw.) of the audio file.
        debug - Enable/disable debug messages.
        Returns:
        true, if audio file was succesfully played
